book.name: Conclusion
book.intro:
Congratulations! You have completed the Learning to Achieve Learning Disabilities and English Language Learners online course. 

You should now understand the prevalence of ELLs;  be able to describe the challenges they face in learning English; identify key considerations when screening and testing ELLs who may have a learning disability; and describe instructional classroom strategies for teaching ELLs with possible or diagnosed learning disabilities.

chapter.title: Participate in the LINCS Community
chapter.content:
Congratulations! You have completed the Learning to Achieve Learning Disabilities and English Language Learners online course. 

You should now understand the prevalence of ELLs;  be able to describe the challenges they face in learning English; identify key considerations when screening and testing ELLs who may have a learning disability; and describe instructional classroom strategies for teaching ELLs with possible or diagnosed learning disabilities.

We encourage you to stay involved in the LINCS Community and the LINCS Disabilities in Adult Education Group as you strive to help the adult ELL students with LD in your classroom be more independent and improve their language acquisition skills. We also encourage you to discuss and apply your newly acquired knowledge and learn about others' experiences in supporting adult ELLs with LD.

chapter.title: Evaluation and certificate
chapter.content:
This concludes the Learning Disabilities and English Language Learners course. We would like to thank Juliana Taymans, who generously contributed to the design and development of this course.

So that we can maintain the quality of our courses, we ask that you take a moment to complete the course evaluation. Your feedback will ensure our courses meet your needs for professional development. Thank you.

Access and Print Your Certificate at Any Time:

Congratulations on completing this LINCS Learning to Achieve course, Learning Disabilities and English Language Learners. To obtain your completion certificate, simply close this window and return to the course homepage. You will find a link for the completion certificate under the Course Conclusion and Resources section header.
